title: 완곡 표현 - 상황적 완곡법
description: 다양한 상황에서 적절한 완곡 표현을 구사하는 원어민 수준의 의사소통을 구사합니다.
examples: The situation is a bit complicated, so it's hard to put it simply.
Since we need to consider various factors, it's hard to give an immediate answer.
Personally I like it, but from an overall standpoint, it's a bit...
learning_points: 원어민 수준의 자연스러운 상황적 완곡법 표현 구사

sentences.kr: 상황이 좀 복잡해서, 단순하게 말씀드리기가 어렵네요.
sentences.en: The situation is a bit complicated, so it's hard to put it simply.

sentences.kr: 여러 요인을 고려해야 해서, 즉답을 드리기 힘들어요.
sentences.en: Since we need to consider various factors, it's hard to give an immediate answer.

sentences.kr: 개인적으로는 좋지만, 전체적인 입장에서는 조금 그래요.
sentences.en: Personally I like it, but from an overall standpoint, it's a bit...

sentences.kr: 원칙적으로는 맞지만, 현실적으로는 다른 문제가 있어요.
sentences.en: In principle it's right, but realistically there are other issues.

sentences.kr: 이상적으로는 그래야겠지만, 실제로는 어려운 부분이 있어요.
sentences.en: Ideally it should be that way, but practically there are difficult aspects.

sentences.kr: 일반적으로는 가능하지만, 이 경우에는 특별한 사정이 있어요.
sentences.en: Generally it's possible, but in this case there are special circumstances.

sentences.kr: 평소라면 괜찮겠지만, 지금 시점에서는 좀 민감해요.
sentences.en: It would usually be fine, but at this point it's a bit sensitive.

sentences.kr: 다른 때였다면 문제없겠지만, 타이밍이 좀 애매해요.
sentences.en: It would be no problem at another time, but the timing is a bit ambiguous.
